author: dlydick
msg: Verify with user that the configured release level is the actual
release number target that should be built and recommend running
'config.sh' if this is not accurate.
Create distribution .tar.gz files at '..' instead of '../..' now that
the SVN repository is in use and its structure is known.
Add distribution of source _only_ and source _with_ docs.
The result will be  'bootJVM-src-CONFIG_RELEASE_LEVEL.tar.gz'
and 'bootJVM-srcdoc-CONFIG_RELEASE_LEVEL.tar.gz'.  This latter
file will contain the documentation package (old behavior of
the script) while the former one (the old file name containing
both) will not.
Use symbolic link for release path name.
Filter out '.svn' subdirectories from 'tar' output.
Minor functional adjustments visible only internal to the script.

author: rwatler
msg: convert inner class to freestanding to promote reuse

author: mjc
msg: Today a one-time change happens to all CAN- names as they are
renamed to CVE-.  Make this change to our changelog.

author: dlydick
msg: Verify with user that the configured release level is the actual
release number target that should be built and recommend running
'config.sh' if this is not accurate.
Use symbolic link instead of directory rename for release path name.
Append CPU type, OS name, and word size to name of .tar.gz file.

the SVN repository is in use and its structure is known.
Minor functional adjustments visible only internal to the script.
